sentence.Network_en: With trembling fingers, he removed the camera from his pocket.
sentence.Network_cn: 他手指哆嗦着从口袋里取出相机.

sentence.Network_en: I was shaking all over, trembling like a leaf.
sentence.Network_cn: 我像风中的落叶一样浑身发抖。

sentence.Network_en: Trembling, she put the phone down. It rang again almost immediately.
sentence.Network_cn: 她颤抖着放下电话听筒，电话几乎立刻又响了起来。

entry.def: If you tremble, you shake slightly because you are frightened or cold.

example.ex: His mouth became dry, his eyes widened, and he began to tremble all over...
example.tran: 他嘴唇发干，眼睛圆睁，全身开始颤抖起来。

example.ex: Gil was white and trembling with anger...
example.tran: 吉尔脸色发白，气得直发抖。

entry.def: If something trembles, it shakes slightly.

example.ex: He felt the earth tremble under him...
example.tran: 他感到大地在脚下颤动。

example.ex: The leaves trembled in the trees.

entry.tran: (通常因难过或紧张而声音)发颤，颤抖
entry.def: If your voice trembles, it sounds unsteady and uncertain, usually because you are upset or nervous.

example.ex: His voice trembled, on the verge of tears.
example.tran: 他声音颤抖，泪水在眼眶里打转。

sentences.sentence: "the shaking of his fingers as he lit his pipe"

means.word_mean: 1. vibrating slightly and irregularly; as e.g. with fear or cold or like the leaves of an aspen in a breeze;

sentences.sentence: "sparkling light from the shivering crystals of the chandelier"

auth_sentence.content: Her trembling hand she heaves To rend her hair.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her trembling hand she heaves To rend her hair.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her trembling hand she heaves To rend her hair.

auth_sentence.content: I may even do with trembling hands some work.
auth_sentence.res_content: I may even do with trembling hands some work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I may even do with trembling hands some work.

auth_sentence.content: My brother and I listened, fearful and trembling.
auth_sentence.res_content: My brother and I listened, fearful and trembling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My brother and I listened, fearful and trembling.

sentences.en: She clenched her hands in her lap to hide their trembling.
sentences.cn: 她攥紧双手放在腿上，以掩饰其颤抖。

sentences.en: Soon Gretel looked up and said in a trembling voice.
sentences.cn: 格雷特尔很快抬头看了看,哆哆嗦嗦地说起话来。

sentences.en: She dimly realized that she was trembling.
sentences.cn: 她隐约感到自己在发抖。
